org.forgerock.cuppa.model

Class TestBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.model.TestBlock

  • public final class TestBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the 'describe' and 'when' function blocks and all nested 'describe', 'when' and test ('it') function blocks.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestBlock

        public TestBlock(TestBlockType type,
                 Behaviour behaviour,
                 java.lang.Class<?> testClass,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 java.util.List<TestBlock> testBlocks,
                 java.util.List<Hook> hooks,
                 java.util.List<Test> tests,
                 Options options)
        Constructs a new TestBlock. Will convert mutable lists to immutable lists.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the test block.
        behaviour - Controls how the test block and its descendants behave.
        testClass - The class that the test block was defined in.
        description - The description of the test block. Will be used for reporting.
        testBlocks - Nested test blocks.
        hooks - Hooks associated with this test block.
        tests - Nested tests.
        options - The set of options applied to the block.
